job_tasks.phrase: Contribute to the development of GenAI services that are integral to our product offerings and user experiences.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to building and integrating GenAI functionalities into product offerings and user experiences, which falls under software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Implement coding best practices to foster code modularity, reusability, and maintainability, enabling our AI services to remain flexible for future advancements.
job_tasks.justification: Focuses on writing high-quality, maintainable code and ensuring flexibility for future development, which are core software development principles.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate AI services into the wider product ecosystem, ensuring a smooth developer experience.
job_tasks.justification: Highlights the integration of AI services into a larger product, requiring collaboration and focus on developer experience, indicative of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Assess and optimize existing AI services to enhance performance and conform to the latest industry trends.
job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'optimize existing AI services' implies working with and improving the performance of AI models, fitting the 'Modeling' category.

job_tasks.phrase: Stay informed on the latest AI technologies and programming techniques, exploring their applicability to our services.
job_tasks.justification: While broad, 'exploring their applicability to our services' can encompass investigating new data-related techniques or models that enhance AI services.

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate AI services into the wider product ecosystem, ensuring a smooth developer experience.
Support and mentor other engineers, contributing to a culture that values technical skill and code quality.
Stay informed on the latest AI technologies and programming techniques, exploring their applicability to our services.

classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes the development and integration of GenAI services into product offerings and user experiences. It also highlights collaboration for integration and optimizing AI services, aligning with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer.
